issue.title: [CF 484] Source/Destination unit doesn't save automatically.
issue.body:
This is one of the minor issues I've been putting off. In the combat event icon menu the two dropdown boxes for source/destination unit(s) to check do not save unless you click into the box and press enter.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #484 | Raw

comments.body:
I think I already fixed this in my development build, but I will check and make sure. I suppose that's the downside of the incredibly infrequent updates recently.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
